attributes.action: Introduce legislation that will in future Support the well being of the pensioners of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people in the UK of pensionable age are now being victimised by the government through high taxes, lowest pensions in the EU, unfair costs of living expenses, this is for the people that have supported, been loyal, and created This England.
The Government are basically turning their back on the people who now need help more than ever. We are looking for support from successeive governments to improve the living standards of the over 60s by giving relief through meaningfull legislation.
